start.help: This bot can help you get a random photo of a cat or dog, check the weather in a city of your choice, check out a cafe in some city, or create some notes and get notificationsðŸ’–

weather.time: Enter the time in HH:MM format for subscription messages:
weather.invalid_time: Invalid time format. Please try again.
weather.text: The weather in ${city} is ${currentWeather}, the temperature is ${currentTempreture}, wind speed is ${currentWind} mph, humidity is ${currentHumidity} percent.

unsubscribe.text: You have unsubscribed from receiving the scheduled message.
